Reference

All functions

Gm

Simulated genotype matrix as class SnpMatrix

MPP.PP.groups.fn()

Summarise, for a set of diseases, posterior probabilities and marginal posterior probabilities by SNP groups

MPP.fn()

Find marginal PP of inclusion for SNPs (MPPi) in marginal models at each kappa value

PP.plot.fn()

Plot a matrix of probabilities, where rows are kappa values and columns are SNPs (MPP matrix) or models (PP matrix)

PPmarginal.multiple.fast.fn()

Approximate (fast) marginal PP for models of a set of diseases, sharing information between the diseases

PPmarginal.multiple.fn()

Marginal PP for models of a set of diseases, sharing information between the diseases

SM2

A list of GUESSFM output for an instance of simulated data

addnull()

addnull

calckappa()

calckappa

calcpp()

calcpp

check.fn()

internal function for MPP.fn

kappaOpt()

Kappa selection

logdiff()

logdiff

logsum()

logsum

make.snp.groups.fn()

SNP groups that have marginal PP of inclusion (MPPi) above a threshold for some disease

marginalone()

Marginal PP for models sharing information between diseases

marginalpp()

Marginal PP for models sharing information between diseases

marginalpp.models()

Marginal PP for models sharing information between diseases

marginalpp.old()

Marginal PP for models sharing information between diseases

p.fn()

Prior probability (in log units) for single trait models

pp.filter.fn()

Filter probability matrix output by threshold

sep.fn()

internal function for MPP.fn

snpGroups

A list of 10 SNP groups in the IL2RA gene.
